original: @151a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @151a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sa mu dri kam pa r'i ksha te na ra laksha ne n'a ma /
analyzed: sa mu dri kam pa r'i ksha te na ra laksha ne n'a ma /
translated: Samudrakamparakshate naralakshane nama.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: mi'i mtshan nyid brtag pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba //
analyzed: mi'i mtshan nyid brtag pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba //
translated: The Ocean of the Examination of Human Characteristics.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Omniscient One.

original: thams cad mkhyen pas thams cad gzigs //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas thams cad gzigs //
translated: The Omniscient One sees everything.

original: dang po'i lha la phyag 'tshal nas //🔽skal bzang skyes pa bud med kyi //
analyzed: dang po'i lha la phyag 'tshal nas // skal bzang skyes pa bud med kyi //
translated: Having paid homage to the primordial deity,🔽I will explain the ocean

original: rgya mtsho rab tu bshad par bya //
analyzed: rgya mtsho rab tu bshad par bya //
translated: For the fortunate, whether male or female.🔽First, one should examine the lifespan,

original: sngon du tshe ni yongs su brtag / phyi nas mtshan nyid la sogs rnams //
analyzed: sngon du tshe ni yongs su brtag / phyi nas mtshan nyid la sogs rnams //
translated: Then the characteristics and so forth.

original: tshe thung pa yi mi rnams la //
analyzed: tshe thung pa yi mi rnams la //
translated: For people with short lifespans,

original: mtshan nyid kyis ni ci zhig bya //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyis ni ci zhig bya //
translated: What use are the characteristics?

original: bud med rnams kyi g-yon gyi cha //
analyzed: bud med rnams kyi g-yon gyi cha //
translated: On the left side of women,

original: skyes pa de ni g-yas su de //
analyzed: skyes pa de ni g-yas su de //
translated: And on the right side of men,

original: rgya mtsho yi ni tshig bzhin du //
analyzed: rgya mtsho yi ni tshig bzhin du //
translated: Like the words of the ocean,🔽Their characteristics should be ascertained.

original: de rnams mtshan nyid nges par brtag / gnas lnga ring zhing bzhi ni thung //
analyzed: de rnams mtshan nyid nges par brtag / gnas lnga ring zhing bzhi ni thung //
translated: Five long, four short,

original: lnga ni 'phra zhing drug ni mtho //
analyzed: lnga ni 'phra zhing drug ni mtho //
translated: Five thin, six tall,

original: bdun ni dmar zhing gsum @151b ni zab //
analyzed: bdun ni dmar zhing gsum @151b ni zab //
translated: Seven are red, three are deep,

original: gsum ni rab tu yangs par bsngags //🔽lag pa mig dang brang dang ni //
analyzed: gsum ni rab tu yangs par bsngags // lag pa mig dang brang dang ni //
translated: and three are praised as very wide.🔽The hands, eyes, and chest

original: de ni pus mo sna de ni //
analyzed: de ni pus mo sna de ni //
translated: are the knees, nose, and

original: yan lag 'di rnams ring ba ni //
analyzed: yan lag 'di rnams ring ba ni //
translated: these limbs.

original: lnga po ring bar bsngags pa ste //
analyzed: lnga po ring bar bsngags pa ste //
translated: These five are praised as long,

original: mgrin pa rkang pa rgyab dang ni //
analyzed: mgrin pa rkang pa rgyab dang ni //
translated: the neck, legs, back,

original: rje ngar rnams ni thung bar bsngags //
analyzed: rje ngar rnams ni thung bar bsngags //
translated: and calves are praised as short.

original: gang gi bzhi ngo thung ba rnams ;
analyzed: gang gi bzhi ngo thung ba rnams ;
translated: Whoever has short

original: / rtag tu mchod pa thob par 'gyur //🔽sor mo phra zhing tshigs pa rnams //
analyzed: / rtag tu mchod pa thob par 'gyur // sor mo phra zhing tshigs pa rnams //
translated: four limbs will always receive worship.🔽The fingers are slender, the joints

original: so dang skra dang sen mo pags //🔽gang gi lnga po phra ba nyid //
analyzed: so dang skra dang sen mo pags // gang gi lnga po phra ba nyid //
translated: are teeth, hair, nails, and skin.🔽Whoever has slender

original: de ni mtshan nyid mchog yin no //🔽mchan 'og rtsib 'og brang dang ni //
analyzed: de ni mtshan nyid mchog yin no // mchan 'og rtsib 'og brang dang ni //
translated: five limbs has the supreme characteristics.🔽The armpits, groin, chest,

original: sna dang dpung ba dpral ba rnams //
analyzed: sna dang dpung ba dpral ba rnams //
translated: nose, shoulders, and forehead🔽are the six that are praised as virtuous when high,

original: rgya mtsho chen po'i bdag nyid kyis //🔽drug po mtho na dge bar bshad //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po'i bdag nyid kyis // drug po mtho na dge bar bshad //
translated: with the nature of the great ocean.

original: lag pa rkang pa'i mthil dmar zhing //
analyzed: lag pa rkang pa'i mthil dmar zhing //
translated: The palms of the hands and soles of the feet are red,

original: mig gi mtha' dang sen mo dang // rkan dang lce dang mchu rnams ni //
analyzed: mig gi mtha' dang sen mo dang // rkan dang lce dang mchu rnams ni //
translated: The eyes, the nails, the palate, the tongue, and the lips,

original: bdun po rnams ni dmar bar bsngags //
analyzed: bdun po rnams ni dmar bar bsngags //
translated: these seven are praised as being red.

original: dbyangs dang sems dang lte ba ste //
analyzed: dbyangs dang sems dang lte ba ste //
translated: The voice, the mind, and the navel,

original: gsum po rnams ni zab na bsngags //
analyzed: gsum po rnams ni zab na bsngags //
translated: these three are praised as being deep.

original: brang dang mgo bo dpral ba ste //
analyzed: brang dang mgo bo dpral ba ste //
translated: The chest, the head, and the forehead,

original: gsum po rnams ni yangs pa bsngags //🔽lus kyi nang nas bzhi'am ni //
analyzed: gsum po rnams ni yangs pa bsngags // lus kyi nang nas bzhi'am ni //
translated: these three are praised as being broad.

original: yang na thams cad du yang brjod //
analyzed: yang na thams cad du yang brjod //
translated: Four or all of these are found within the body.

original: de la mchog tu rna dang ni //
analyzed: de la mchog tu rna dang ni //
translated: Among them, the best are the ears,

original: de bzhin mchog tu so rnams dang // kha dog rnams ni mchog tu snum //
analyzed: de bzhin mchog tu so rnams dang // kha dog rnams ni mchog tu snum //
translated: and likewise the best are the teeth, and the colors are best when shiny.

original: dbyangs ni mchog tu snyan pa dang // dbyangs las mchog tu bden pa dang // kun nas bden pas rab tu gnas //
analyzed: dbyangs ni mchog tu snyan pa dang // dbyangs las mchog tu bden pa dang // kun nas bden pas rab tu gnas //
translated: The voice is best when sweet, and from the voice, truth is best, and from truth, complete truth.

original: mig dmar bud med spong mi byed //
analyzed: mig dmar bud med spong mi byed //
translated: One should not abandon a woman with red eyes.

original: gser mdog dmar skya nor med min //
analyzed: gser mdog dmar skya nor med min //
translated: One with a golden complexion and a reddish tinge is not poor.

original: lag ring rnams ni dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: lag ring rnams ni dbang phyug ste //
translated: Those with long arms are powerful.

original: yan lag mdzes bsngags bden par byed //
analyzed: yan lag mdzes bsngags bden par byed //
translated: One praised as having beautiful limbs is truthful.

original: dbang po chung na nor ldan zhing //
analyzed: dbang po chung na nor ldan zhing //
translated: One with small limbs is wealthy.

original: bu bral che bas nor rnams dman //
analyzed: bu bral che bas nor rnams dman //
translated: If the left buttock is larger, the wealth is less.

original: sgro ba'i g-yon dma' bu nor nyams //
analyzed: sgro ba'i g-yon dma' bu nor nyams //
translated: If the left buttock is lower, the wealth of the son is lost.

original: gzhan rnams mon po bu ldan dbul //
analyzed: gzhan rnams mon po bu ldan dbul //
translated: If the other [buttock] is higher, the poor man has a son.🔽If the veins are large, rough, and high,

original: mgo bo che zhing rtsa phra dang // rtsub dang rtsa ni mtho ba dang // spro ma dang mdud pa gang 'gyur dbul //
analyzed: mgo bo che zhing rtsa phra dang // rtsub dang rtsa ni mtho ba dang // spro ma dang mdud pa gang 'gyur dbul //
translated: if there is a knot or a swelling, one is poor.🔽If [the veins] are soft, one is always happy.

original: mnyen pas rtag tu bde ba dang // rtags ni gyong po yul gzhan 'khyam //
analyzed: mnyen pas rtag tu bde ba dang // rtags ni gyong po yul gzhan 'khyam //
translated: If the signs are hard, one wanders to other lands.

original: chung ngu rnams ni skal ba bzang //
analyzed: chung ngu rnams ni skal ba bzang //
translated: If they are small, one has good fortune.🔽If they are large, one is poor.

original: chen po yis ni dbul po dang // dma' mos bud med nges par rgyal //
analyzed: chen po yis ni dbul po dang // dma' mos bud med nges par rgyal //
translated: If they are low, a woman is certain to win.

original: sgro ba mnyam zhing mdzes par mthong //
analyzed: sgro ba mnyam zhing mdzes par mthong //
translated: If the buttocks are even, one sees beauty.

original: phan pa dang ni cho dang ldan //
analyzed: phan pa dang ni cho dang ldan //
translated: If they are helpful, one has good fortune.

original: brang yangs 'bru dang nor rnams spyod //
analyzed: brang yangs 'bru dang nor rnams spyod //
translated: If the chest is large, one enjoys grain and wealth.

original: bu yangs mi @152a * //🔽bdag mchod dang ldan //
analyzed: bu yangs mi @152a * // bdag mchod dang ldan //
translated: If the belly is large, one has a son.

original: rked yangs bu ni mang du spyod //
analyzed: rked yangs bu ni mang du spyod //
translated: If the waist is large, one enjoys many sons.

original: rkang pa yangs pa nor dang ldan //
analyzed: rkang pa yangs pa nor dang ldan //
translated: If the feet are large, one has wealth.

original: mig snum pa ni skal ba bzang //
analyzed: mig snum pa ni skal ba bzang //
translated: If the eyes are oily, one has good fortune.

original: so snum pa ni zas dang ldan //
analyzed: so snum pa ni zas dang ldan //
translated: If the teeth are oily, one has food.

original: pags pa snum pa bde bar 'gyur //
analyzed: pags pa snum pa bde bar 'gyur //
translated: If the skin is oily, one will be happy.

original: rkang ba snum pa bzhon par ldan //
analyzed: rkang ba snum pa bzhon par ldan //
translated: The one with oily feet will have a mount.

original: las med lag pa dag ni sra //
analyzed: las med lag pa dag ni sra //
translated: The one with no lines on the hands will be poor.

original: rkang pa dag ni lam la mnyen //
analyzed: rkang pa dag ni lam la mnyen //
translated: The one with soft feet will have a good road.

original: gang gi lag pa rkang par ldan //
analyzed: gang gi lag pa rkang par ldan //
translated: The one with lines on the hands and feet

original: de ni rgyal por nges par ldan //
analyzed: de ni rgyal por nges par ldan //
translated: will certainly be a king.

original: gang la nya yi dbyibs yod na //
analyzed: gang la nya yi dbyibs yod na //
translated: The one with a fish shape

original: brgya yi bdag por shes par bya //
analyzed: brgya yi bdag por shes par bya //
translated: should be known as a lord of a hundred.🔽The one with a shape on both sides

original: phan tshun gyis ni stong du shes //
analyzed: phan tshun gyis ni stong du shes //
translated: should be known as a lord of a thousand.🔽The one with a shape like a conch

original: dung gis bye bar shes par bya //
analyzed: dung gis bye bar shes par bya //
translated: should be known as a lord of ten thousand.🔽The one with a shape like a lotus

original: padma yis ni bye ba stong //
analyzed: padma yis ni bye ba stong //
translated: should be known as a lord of a hundred thousand.

original: mthe'u chung gi phyogs rnams nas //
analyzed: mthe'u chung gi phyogs rnams nas //
translated: From the side of the little finger,

original: ming med la ni ri mo 'gro //🔽rtags ni de yi sum cu'i lor //
analyzed: ming med la ni ri mo 'gro // rtags ni de yi sum cu'i lor //
translated: the line goes to the ring finger.🔽This sign should be known as the life

original: 'tsho ba nyid du shes par bya //
analyzed: 'tsho ba nyid du shes par bya //
translated: up to the thirtieth year.

original: mthe'u chung gi phyogs rnams nas //
analyzed: mthe'u chung gi phyogs rnams nas //
translated: From the side of the little finger,

original: gung mo la ni ri mo 'gro //🔽'di yi rtags kyis drug cu'i lor //
analyzed: gung mo la ni ri mo 'gro // 'di yi rtags kyis drug cu'i lor //
translated: the line goes to the middle finger.🔽This sign should be known as the life

original: 'tsho ba nyid du shes par bya //
analyzed: 'tsho ba nyid du shes par bya //
translated: up to the sixtieth year.

original: mnyam pa'i phyir na brgyad cur 'tsho //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i phyir na brgyad cur 'tsho //
translated: The one with equal [lines] will live eighty years.

original: ma mnyam de bzhin bdun cur 'tsho //
analyzed: ma mnyam de bzhin bdun cur 'tsho //
translated: The one with unequal [lines] will live seventy years.

original: tshigs pas dman pa'i skyes bu rnams //
analyzed: tshigs pas dman pa'i skyes bu rnams //
translated: The one with a joint less [than the other]

original: lo ni drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lo ni drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur //
translated: He will live sixty years.

original: ma tho ba chen gyi ni tshigs kyi dbus //
analyzed: ma tho ba chen gyi ni tshigs kyi dbus //
translated: In the middle of the major joints,

original: gang la nas yod rnam par dge //
analyzed: gang la nas yod rnam par dge //
translated: wherever there is barley, is auspicious.

original: rnyed dang zas su longs spyod cing //
analyzed: rnyed dang zas su longs spyod cing //
translated: He will enjoy wealth and food,

original: mi de bde ba'i longs spyod ldan //
analyzed: mi de bde ba'i longs spyod ldan //
translated: and that man will have the enjoyment of happiness.

original: ri mo mang po nyon mongs shing //
analyzed: ri mo mang po nyon mongs shing //
translated: If there are many lines, there is much affliction;

original: nyung ba yis ni nor dman no //
analyzed: nyung ba yis ni nor dman no //
translated: if few, there is little wealth.

original: dmar po yis ni bde ba thob //
analyzed: dmar po yis ni bde ba thob //
translated: If red, he will obtain happiness;

original: nag po yis ni khol por byed //
analyzed: nag po yis ni khol por byed //
translated: if black, he will be a slave.

original: slo ma'i dbyibs dang rnam par rtsub //
analyzed: slo ma'i dbyibs dang rnam par rtsub //
translated: If the shape of the nails is rough,🔽crooked, pale,🔽with lines at the tip,🔽very white,

original: sen mo yon po skya bo dang // rtse mo la ni ri mo dang // shin tu dkar bar gyur ba dang // rkang pa'i sor mo sprad pa ni //
analyzed: sen mo yon po skya bo dang // rtse mo la ni ri mo dang // shin tu dkar bar gyur ba dang // rkang pa'i sor mo sprad pa ni //
translated: and the toes close together,

original: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu ster //
analyzed: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu ster //
translated: he will experience the suffering of poverty.🔽If his feet are hot

original: gang gi rkang pa tsha ba dang // ngur smrig 'dra bar gyur ba ni //
analyzed: gang gi rkang pa tsha ba dang // ngur smrig 'dra bar gyur ba ni //
translated: and resemble saffron,

original: rigs ni rnam par chad pa ste //
analyzed: rigs ni rnam par chad pa ste //
translated: his family will be cut off.

original: tshangs 'joms gzhan gyi las byed pa //
analyzed: tshangs 'joms gzhan gyi las byed pa //
translated: He will commit the act of killing a Brahmin,

original: sa stengs dbang med mnar bar byed //
analyzed: sa stengs dbang med mnar bar byed //
translated: and will be tormented without control on the surface of the earth.

original: rdul mi 'byung zhing mthil ni mnyen //
analyzed: rdul mi 'byung zhing mthil ni mnyen //
translated: The soles of the feet are soft and smooth,

original: padma'i lte ba lta bus te //
analyzed: padma'i lte ba lta bus te //
translated: with a depression like the navel of a lotus.🔽The fingers and toes are long,

original: sor mo 'byar zhing mdzes pa dang // sen mo zangs mdog rting pa legs //
analyzed: sor mo 'byar zhing mdzes pa dang // sen mo zangs mdog rting pa legs //
translated: the nails copper-colored, and the heels well-formed.🔽The ankles are not prominent,

original: bro zhing rtsa ni mi mngon dang // long bu dag ni mi mngon zhing //
analyzed: bro zhing rtsa ni mi mngon dang // long bu dag ni mi mngon zhing //
translated: and the legs are like those of the antelope.

original: rkang pa rus sbal ltar mtho na //
analyzed: rkang pa rus sbal ltar mtho na //
translated: If the feet are high like a tortoise,

original: mi rnams kyi ni dbang phyug go //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi ni dbang phyug go //
translated: one will be a lord of men.

original: shin tu blo ldan grags pa ldan //
analyzed: shin tu blo ldan grags pa ldan //
translated: The very intelligent are famous,

original: de bzhin du ni rnam @152b par gnon //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni rnam @152b par gnon //
translated: and likewise, they are well-known.🔽Those with eyes that are pleasant and very oily

original: bde dang shin tu snum pa'i mig / de rnams tshe ni thung bar bshad //
analyzed: bde dang shin tu snum pa'i mig / de rnams tshe ni thung bar bshad //
translated: are said to have a short life.

original: gos ngan so yi dri ma sel //
analyzed: gos ngan so yi dri ma sel //
translated: Wearing poor clothing, they remove the stains of others.

original: mang du za zhing tshig rtsub smra //
analyzed: mang du za zhing tshig rtsub smra //
translated: Eating much, they speak harsh words.

original: nyi ma nub shar nyal ba rnams //
analyzed: nyi ma nub shar nyal ba rnams //
translated: Sleeping when the sun is rising or setting,

original: gal te 'khor lo lag ldan yang //
analyzed: gal te 'khor lo lag ldan yang //
translated: if they have a wheel or an arm,

original: dpal ni rnam par spong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dpal ni rnam par spong bar 'gyur //
translated: their glory will be completely destroyed.

original: mgo bo la ni me tog bcas //
analyzed: mgo bo la ni me tog bcas //
translated: If flowers are placed on the head

original: rkang pa la ni legs par mchod //
analyzed: rkang pa la ni legs par mchod //
translated: and properly worshipped on the feet,

original: yan lag mchog ldan bsten pa dang // kha zas nyung du spyod pa dang // gos med nyal bar mi byed cing //
analyzed: yan lag mchog ldan bsten pa dang // kha zas nyung du spyod pa dang // gos med nyal bar mi byed cing //
translated: not sleeping naked,

original: dus tshigs 'khrig pa mi bsten na //
analyzed: dus tshigs 'khrig pa mi bsten na //
translated: not engaging in sex during the seasons,

original: dpal ni rab tu nyams gyur kyang //
analyzed: dpal ni rab tu nyams gyur kyang //
translated: even if glory is greatly diminished,

original: slar yang rab tu thob par 'gyur ;
analyzed: slar yang rab tu thob par 'gyur ;
translated: it will be regained.

original: / mi sbyin gyis gsungs pa'i rgya mtsho las skyes pa'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste dang po'o /
analyzed: / mi sbyin gyis gsungs pa'i rgya mtsho las skyes pa'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste dang po'o /
translated: This concludes the first chapter on the characteristics of the ocean-born, as taught by Ajita.

original: // / mi sbyin gyi ni gsung ji bzhin //
analyzed: // / mi sbyin gyi ni gsung ji bzhin //
translated: As taught by Ajita,

original: bud med mtshan nyid bshad par bya //🔽nyi ma 'char kha'i 'od mtshungs pa'i //
analyzed: bud med mtshan nyid bshad par bya // nyi ma 'char kha'i 'od mtshungs pa'i //
translated: I will explain the characteristics of women.

original: bu mo zla ba gnag ba'i gdong //
analyzed: bu mo zla ba gnag ba'i gdong //
translated: A girl whose face is dark like the light of the rising sun,

original: mig yangs mchu ni dmar ba yi //
analyzed: mig yangs mchu ni dmar ba yi //
translated: with wide eyes and red lips,

original: bu mo de ni rnyed na bde //
analyzed: bu mo de ni rnyed na bde //
translated: if found, brings happiness.

original: autpal sngon po'i mdog ltar sngo //
analyzed: autpal sngon po'i mdog ltar sngo //
translated: Blue like the color of a blue lotus,

original: ri dags mig can glang ltar dkar //
analyzed: ri dags mig can glang ltar dkar //
translated: with deer-like eyes, white like an elephant,🔽adorned with all kinds of precious jewels

original: nor bu rin chen mtha' dag dang // gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan gyur ma //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen mtha' dag dang // gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan gyur ma //
translated: and golden ornaments,

original: de ni gang zhig mig nag pa'i //
analyzed: de ni gang zhig mig nag pa'i //
translated: she who has dark eyes

original: bu mo dkar mo shin tu mdzes //
analyzed: bu mo dkar mo shin tu mdzes //
translated: A girl who is fair, very beautiful,

original: mig yangs mchu ni dmar ba yi //
analyzed: mig yangs mchu ni dmar ba yi //
translated: with large eyes and red lips,

original: bu mo de ni rnyed na bde //
analyzed: bu mo de ni rnyed na bde //
translated: is a girl who, when found, brings happiness.

original: gang zhig 'gro ba tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gro ba tsam gyis ni //
translated: She who, by merely walking,

original: sa gzhi g-yo ba ltar byed 'gro //🔽ji ltar mi sbyin gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: sa gzhi g-yo ba ltar byed 'gro // ji ltar mi sbyin gsungs pa ni //
translated: makes the earth tremble, as it were,🔽is said to be one who is hostile,

original: de yi zhe 'gras byed par gsungs //🔽gang gi sor mo mi sdug cing //
analyzed: de yi zhe 'gras byed par gsungs // gang gi sor mo mi sdug cing //
translated: if one does not give her to someone.🔽She who has ugly fingers

original: rkang pa'i mthil ni nyag por gyur //
analyzed: rkang pa'i mthil ni nyag por gyur //
translated: and the soles of her feet are webbed,

original: de yang zhe 'gras byed pa ni ;
analyzed: de yang zhe 'gras byed pa ni ;
translated: is also said to be one who is hostile,

original: / ji ltar mi sbyin gyis ni gsungs //
analyzed: / ji ltar mi sbyin gyis ni gsungs //
translated: if one does not give her to someone.🔽She who does not touch the ground

original: gang zhig rkang pa'i mthe chung dag / sa gzhi la ni mi reg na //
analyzed: gang zhig rkang pa'i mthe chung dag / sa gzhi la ni mi reg na //
translated: with the little toe of her foot,

original: bdag po brgya yang myur 'joms shing //
analyzed: bdag po brgya yang myur 'joms shing //
translated: will quickly destroy even a hundred masters,

original: de srid de ni 'tsho bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de srid de ni 'tsho bar 'gyur //
translated: and she will live as long as she does not die.

original: gang gi skra yi tshogs pa rnams //
analyzed: gang gi skra yi tshogs pa rnams //
translated: She whose mass of hair

original: rtag tu langs bar gyur pa ni //
analyzed: rtag tu langs bar gyur pa ni //
